did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This holding consists of a single manuscript, AMsS, 62 pp., written in pencil on unlined paper (21 x 17.5 cm), red-lined paper (28.5 x 19.5 cm), and blue-lined paper (31 x 20 cm).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains Richard Harding Davis's manuscript for "Miss Delmar's Understudy."
